text: Kermia euryacme is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Raphitomidae. ==Description== The length of the shell varies between 4 mm and 5 mm. ==Distribution== This marine species occurs off Taiwan. ==References== * Mellvill, J. Cosmo. "Descriptions of eight new species of the family Turridae and of a new species of Mitra." Journal of Molluscan Studies 17.4 (1927): 149–155. ==External links== * Gastropods.com: Kermia euryacme euryacme Category:Gastropods described in 1927
title: Kermia euryacme
